name: The Leap - Pre Alpha 0.1.3
description:
It's an alpha.

  To pick up and drag boxes hold E and move your mouse around.

ESC is for the pause menu, or to resume the game after you've paused.

To finish a level you must open the door by placing a box onto the red button and going into the room.

In the room you will find a stand with a button on it. Get close to the button and press RMB and you're on to the next level!

There are three levels in the game so far, but stay tuned, more levels are going to be added very soon which introduce more features and polish.

The second level features a teleporter for the box.

Try going in it. Nothing happens.

The third and new level now features an Elevator!

Only boxes and pick-uppable items can be teleported through them. Entrances to portals have four colored stripes in each corner, and exits have the same color coded stripes, but around the perimeter of the exit. 

MOVEMENT

The movement is an indirect modified port of the Quake 3/ Half-Life / Source movement, so a form of strafe jumping or bunnyhopping is possible for any speedrunners out there.

SAVING AND LOADING GAMES

Currently you can save and load games, but no drop down menu to view the saved games is incorporated.

To save a game you must:

1)  Type in the name of your savegame in the text input area

2)  Click on the SAVE button.

To load a game you must:

1)  Type in the name of your savegame in the text input area

2)  Click on the LOAD button.
